title: OptProf pipeline improvements
body:
Consider implementing some of the following pipeline improvements:

1. The detection of vs bootstrap branch, see [PR comment](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/8085#discussion_r1003405325).
2. The LKG feature.
3. Investigate and fix issue with two tests failing in opt-prof pipeline attempting to ngen `MSBuildTaskHost.dll`. See any opt-prof v2 pipeline run for a repro.
4.  On the cron, target the top pipeline run for the main branch of MSBuild pipeline, instead of the top pipeline run.
